DOC.detailed_description: The current study multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo- control clinical trial . The eligible subject assign randomly 2 arm , Vaccine + Lamivudine group Placebo + Lamivudine group , respectively , ratio 2:1 . The efficacy variable include change HBV DNA load Week 72 , visit rate subject HBV DNA titer reduce > 2 logarithm , change HBeAg HBsAg titer , change ALT , HBsAg/HBeAg serum conversion rate , INF-gamma expression level peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) , amount HBV-specific CTL , change expression level peripheral cytokine ( IL-4 , IL-10 , IL-12 INF-gamma ) baseline level .
